rules.name: blockEventChunkLoading
rules.description: Block event can load 3x3 chunks for 8gt

rules.name: cobwebSlowdownSpeed
rules.description: Overwrite the slowdown speed of cobwebs

rules.name: commandReplaceProperties
rules.description: Enables /replaceproperties command for easily replacing properties of all blocks in a range
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: containerDropInventoryDisabled
rules.description: Containers such as chests and barrels won't drop their inventories when being broke

rules.name: creeperDropCompletely
rules.description: Creeper explosions will have a 100% drop rate

rules.name: creeperIgnitedByFire
rules.description: Creepers can be ignited when they are on fire

rules.name: customVersion
rules.description: Set a custom version on client trying to connect to the server

rules.name: dispensersNotAffectPlayers
rules.description: Dispensers will not dispense armor to players

rules.name: editableSign
rules.description: Use a sign block with main hand empty when you are sneaking to reopen the sign editor

rules.name: endLightningRod
rules.description: End rods will act like lightning rod in 1.17
extras: Lightning will NOT naturally spawn on end rods, but it will when end rods are hit by a trident with the Channeling enchantment

rules.name: endermitesInconsistencyFix
rules.description: Endermen will be hostile to endermites spawned by spawn eggs or /summon command (fixes MC-53518)
extras: This rule is only available in <1.17 since MC-53518 got fixed in 20w46a

rules.name: fakePlayerNameSuggestions
rules.description: Overwrite the player list suggested when using /player command

rules.name: fakePlayerPrefixRestriction
rules.description: /player command will only be able to spawn fake players with the given prefix

rules.name: fakePlayerSuffixRestriction
rules.description: Player command will only be able to spawn fake players with the given suffix

rules.name: flippinCactusSound
rules.description: Play 'BLOCK_DISPENSER_LAUNCH' sound when using cactus to flip block

rules.name: functionalSpongeItem
rules.description: Sponge items do water clearance and dry in the nether after 60gt

rules.name: icaSyncProtocol
rules.description: A protocol to sync server data to client mods

rules.name: infiniteWaterDisabled
rules.description: Infinite water will not form

rules.name: magmaBlockDamageItem
rules.description: Items on magma block get damages

rules.name: mendableIronGolem
rules.description: Use an iron ingot at an iron golem to mend it (+25 Health)

rules.name: mendableSnowGolem
rules.description: Use a snowball at a snow golem or hit a snow golem with a snowball to mend it (+1 Health)

rules.name: mobAlwaysPickUpLoot
rules.description: Zombies and skeletons and their variants will always be able to pick up loot like other mobs

rules.name: mobBlackList
rules.description: Stop some mobs from spawning

rules.name: mobSpawningRestrictionMode
rules.description: Modify the way to restrict mob spawning
extras: whitelist: Only mobs defined in rule 'mobWhiteList' can spawn in the world. Rule 'mobBlackList' will be ignored
blacklist: Mobs defined in rule 'mobBlackList' cannot spawn in the world. Rule 'mobWhiteList' will be ignored

rules.name: mobWhiteList
rules.description: Only allow some mobs to spawn

rules.name: pistonBedrockBreakingFix
rules.description: Fix bedrock breaking with head-less piston
extras: Technically piston heads will not remove any block other than itself

rules.name: playerCommandNoControlSelf
rules.description: Players can't control themselves using /player command

rules.name: renewableSoulSand
rules.description: A sand turn into a soul sand when a mob suffered in it

rules.name: spongeDryInNether
rules.description: Wet sponge will transform to sponge immediately when placing in the nether

rules.name: stopFreezing
rules.description: Stop generating ice at any biome

rules.name: strictBlockPlacement
rules.description: Player will not be able to do block placement on air (prevents litematica easyPlaceMode)

rules.name: unbreakableHelmetInSunlight
rules.description: Helmet equipped by an undead will not be damaged by sunlight

rules.name: undeadImmuneToSunlight
rules.description: Undead will not burn in sunlight
extras: If a undead is equipped with a helmet, the helmet will not be damaged

rules.name: xpCounter
rules.description: A tool like 'hopperCounter' to use players as xp counters
extras: Use '/xpcounter <player> reset' to reset a player's counter
Use '/xpcounter <player>' to query a player's counter
Use '/log xpcounter <players>' to subscribe xp counters
